issue.title: common_iterator is not sufficiently constrained for non-copyable iterators

discussion.p: We don't actually specify anywhere that non-copyable iterators do not have a common_iterator (and it would make little sense for them to as algorithms dealing with C++17 iterators are not expecting non-copyable things) As it stands common_iterator can be created from move only iterator but are then non-copyable themselves. P1862 already constrains common_view in a similar fashion
